entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error when building bundle in Dockerfile #29927
  • Include( x => x.Child.OrderBy ) does not work in Postgresql #29925
  • Generate expression trees in compiled models (query filters, value converters) #29924
  • The host was aborted exception when adding new migration #29923

Closed

  • Log a warning when Ignore is called on an explicitly configured property or type #12082
    8.0.0
  • Support lazy and explicit loading from entities queried with NoTracking behavior #10042
    8.0.0
  • Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29513
    8.0.0
  • Maybe wrong literal mapping of SQL Server TimeSpan? #29922

PullRequests

Created

  • Flow query tracking behavior to materialization interceptor #29928
  • [release/7.0] Avoid circular dependency for unique indexes with null values #29921
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Warn when entity type, property, or navigation is ignored after being explicitly mapped #29926
  • Allow service properties typed as object #29919
  • Fix to #29513 - Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29808

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29920
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
